comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: 11 September 1943: MAJ Richard A. Rann was at the controls of P-47D serial 42-7962 when he made this forced landing at Atcham. The aircraft was repaired, eventually ending up with the 552nd Fighter Training Squadron. LT Thomas A. Ernst was flying this ship on 29 July 1944 when he was killed in a midair collision over Tophouse Farm.
